treatment.description: Plants 10–70 cm. Leaves glabrous, scabroso-hirtellous, ± hirsute to hirtellous, or villous, glandular or not, glands yellow. Involucres 2.5–10 mm. Anthers yellow, brownish, or purple. Pappi of 3–5 linear or subulate scales.

key_statement.statement: Leaves villous or ± hirsute, coarsely stipitate-glandular; paleae sometimes with 2 purple lines (along inner edges of scarious margins); anthers reddish to dark purple
Leaves glabrous, scabroso-hirtellous, or ± hirsute to hirtellous, not villous, glandular or not; paleae lacking purple lines; anthers yellow or brownish.
Leaves scabroso-hirtellous (and usually ± hirsute or setose-ciliate), not glandular or glands minute, sparsely and irregularly distributed; involucres 3.5–5 mm; ray laminae 2–3 mm
Leaves glabrous or hirsute to hirtellous, glandular or not; involucres 4–10 mm; ray laminae 2.5–5(–6) mm.
Peduncular bracts seldom glandular (sometimes with yellowish, minute, stipitate glands among eglandular hairs); ray laminae 2.5–3(–4.5) mm
Peduncular bracts coarsely glandular (glands yellow, sessile or stipitate); ray laminae 3–5(–6) mm
